title: A Monster's Voyage
creator_contributor_role: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT, production company
abstract: One girl's metaphorical mythical journey, expressed through paint on glass animation.
description: A young girl and her loyal friend are on a voyage together. While they are self-sufficient and happy, nothing can stay the same forever. This artistically creative short animation expresses emotion and feeling in its story-telling and has a mythical quality of legends and folklore. Use of strong colours and hand-drawn animation. Created as part of coursework at the Centre for Animation and Interactive Media (AIM), RMIT, 2005.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000490; RMIT AIM Collection 2005 = Take AIM 2005; Active; 2005
VoD Program; B2002544; Transition through Animation; Active; 2012
